org.anchoranalysis.image.core.outline

Class FindOutline

  • Object
    • FindOutline

  • public class FindOutline
extends Object
    Finds outline voxels i.e. pixels on the contour/edge of the object.

    Specifically, it converts a solid-object (where all voxels inside an object are ON) into where only pixels on the contour are ON

    A new object/mask is always created, so the existing buffers are not overwritten

    The outline is always guaranteed to be inside the existing mask (so always a subset of ON voxels).

      static Mask outlineGuess3D(Mask mask, int numberErosions, boolean force2D, boolean outlineAtBoundary)
      Finds the outline of a mask, guessing whether to do this in 2D or 3D depending on if the mask has 3-dimensions

    • Method Detail

      • outlineGuess3D

        public static Mask outlineGuess3D(Mask mask,
                                  int numberErosions,
                                  boolean force2D,
                                  boolean outlineAtBoundary)
        Finds the outline of a mask, guessing whether to do this in 2D or 3D depending on if the mask has 3-dimensions
        Parameters:
        mask - the mask to find an outline for
        numberErosions - the number of erosions, effectively determining how thick the outline is
        force2D - if true, 2D will ALWAYS be used irrespective of the guessing
        outlineAtBoundary - if true, an edge is shown also for the boundary of the scene. if false, this is not shown.
        Returns:
        a newly-created mask showing only the outline

      • outline

        public static Mask outline(Mask mask,
                           int numberErosions,
                           boolean do3D,
                           boolean outlineAtBoundary)
        Creates an outline of depth 1 from a mask
        Parameters:
        mask - the mask
        numberErosions - the number of erosions, effectively determining how thick the outline is
        do3D - whether to also perform the outline in the third dimension. This is typically unwanted for 2 dimensional images, as every voxel inside the object is treated as on the boundary and a filled in object is produced.
        outlineAtBoundary - if true, an edge is shown also for the boundary of the scene. if false, this is not shown.
        Returns:

      • outline

        public static ObjectMask outline(ObjectMask object,
                                 int numberErosions,
                                 boolean do3D,
                                 boolean outlineAtBoundary)
        Creates outline from an object

        It potentially uses multiple erosions to create a deeper outline.

        Parameters:
        object - object to find outline for
        numberErosions - the number of erosions, effectively determining how thick the outline is
        outlineAtBoundary - if true, an edge is shown also for the boundary of the scene. if false, this is not shown.
        do3D - whether to also perform the outline in the third dimension. This is typically unwanted for 2 dimensional images, as every voxel inside the object is treated as on the boundary and a filled in object is produced.
